content:
At a launch event in China on December 28, 2021, Xiaomi unveiled the latest version of its Android skin — MIUI 13. As you’d expect, MIUI 13 comes with a bunch of new features and performance improvements, including new privacy features, a new system font, a bunch of cool wallpapers, and even a version optimized

The post MIUI 13: Features, Rollout Schedule, Download Links and more from Xiaomi’s latest Android skin appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Xiaomi has unveiled the latest version of its custom Android skin: MIUI 13. Read on for new features, wallpapers, download links, and more!
